com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement
Class QueryStatement

java.lang.Object
  com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Statement
      com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.QueryStatement

public class QueryStatement
extends Statement

A statement producer that use to producing SELECT command of SQL language. The completed SQL statement would be sent to SQLiteDatabase objects to execute.

See Also:
DBOverseer

Method Detail

produce

public static Statement produce(java.lang.Object... columns)
Producing a normal SELECT statement.

Parameters:
columns - A list of which columns you desired to return, leave it empty will return all columns. Each column can be either a normal String which just the column name or wrapped the column name's Function||Alias||Scoping object.
Returns:
the created statement.

distinct

public static Statement distinct(java.lang.Object... columns)
Producing a SELECT statement by DISTINCT clause.

Parameters:
columns - A list of which columns you desired to return, leave it empty will return all columns. Each column can be either a normal String which just the column name or wrapped the column name's Function||Alias||Scoping object.
Returns:
the created statement.

processColumns

public Statement processColumns(java.lang.Object... columns)
Processing the column list, append to statement.

Parameters:
columns - A list of which columns you desired to return, leave it empty will return all columns. Each column can be either a normal String which just the column name or wrapped the column name's Function||Alias||Scoping object.
Returns:
the created statement.

rowCount

public static Statement rowCount()
Producing a "SELECT count(*) ..." statement.

Returns:
the created statement.

union

public static Statement union(boolean distinct,
                              Statement... subQueries)
Producing an UNION statement that combine the results of two or more SELECT statements.

Parameters:
distinct - true if you want the results without returning any duplicate rows. otherwise would including duplicate rows.
subQueries - an array of SQL SELECT statements, all of which must have the same columns as the same positions in their results.
Returns:
the created statement.
See Also:
SQLiteQueryBuilder.buildUnionQuery(String[], String, String)
